XenotypeDef.label: fleshmorph
XenotypeDef.description:
Being of unknown origin, it is unclear whether the creation of the fleshmorphs was the result of a failed experiment or a cruel joke. Given their resemblance to fleshbeasts, though, they are generally associated with the void.

Beyond their monstrous form, fleshbeasts are afflicted by a sort of genetic chaos. Their anatomy is constantly shifting, and their genome is generally unstable.

Most fleshbeasts are resentful of the wretched form they have been twisted into.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A human whose body has been twisted and warped beyond recognition. Fleshmorphs are known for their bizarre anatomy, unstable genome, and generally monstrous qualities.
